strenght.desc: With this skill you can hold heavy weapons and deal higher damage

health.desc: With this skill you can increase your capacity to absorb damage

lumberjack.desc: Get wood efficiently! Boosts the outcome of wood

xpboost.desc: Collect XP faster, Gain more Xp per battle

miner.desc: Mine Ores Carefully, Wou can call it Fortune enchantment.

reaper.desc: Reap crops and search around the area effectivly.
